name: Mobile Hazards
description:
Mobile Hazards

This is a Ludum Dare 42 entry. #LDJAM #LD42
Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/mobile-hazards

This is my eleventh time to attend Ludum Dare. Hope that everyone will enjoy my game :) 

This is an action game. Nowadays, almost everyone depends on their mobile device. So there are more and more messages and notifications from different applications. You discover your cell phone is running out of space but it's overrun with garbage. Save your cell phone from crashing by running out of space!

Game Goal:
  • Prevent garbage from getting into the phone as much as you can.
Control: 
  • Click (Tap) to delete small garbage.
  • Swipe to throw big garbage and it will also delete small garbage on the way. (out of the screen to delete big garbage)
Used tools:  Game Engine
  • Unity 
Version Control 
  • Git Kraken
Chart
  • Coggle 
  • Draw.io 

Most of the resources of arts and audio come from online resources. 
Designed and made by Cliff-Lee-CL.
